name: ABlueberryBoost
0:
”Alexa, ask A Blueberry Boost what can I make with frozen blueberries?”
”Alexa, ask A Blueberry Boost what vitamins and minerals are in blueberries?”
”Alexa, ask A Blueberry Boost what flavors go with blueberry?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: a blueberry boost
des:
Blueberries are colorful, healthy and delicious … and Alexa is ready to tell you all about them. A Blueberry Boost delivers exactly what the name suggests – all kinds of ideas and inspiration for eating more blueberries in more ways throughout the day. Ask Alexa any questions you have about blueberries, whether you’re shopping, meal planning, baking, cooking or hosting an event. You’ll get recipes, tips, kitchen hacks and more. Getting your daily boost of blue starts here!

The content provided in this skill is for informational and educational purposes only. It is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. Seek the advice of a qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
